Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

CircuitSummary.description: The summary of circuit information for this PDU.
CircuitSummary.longDescription: This type shall contain the summary information regarding circuits for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ControlledOutlets.description: The number of controlled Outlets included in this Rack PDU.
ControlledOutlets.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of controlled Outlets of RackPDU.

MonitoredBranches.description: The number of monitored Branches supported by this Rack PDU.
MonitoredBranches.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of Branches of RackPDU.

MonitoredOutlets.description: The number of monitored Outlets included in this Rack PDU.
MonitoredOutlets.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of monitored Outlets of RackPDU.

MonitoredPhases.description: The number of monitored Phases supported by this Rack PDU.
MonitoredPhases.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of Phases of RackPDU.

TotalBranches.description: The maximum number of Branch Circuits supported by the Rack PDU.
TotalBranches.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of Branch Circuits for this RackPDU.

TotalOutlets.description: The total number of Outlets included in this Rack PDU.
TotalOutlets.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of Outlets of RackPDU.

TotalPhases.description: The maximum number of Phases of RackPDU.
TotalPhases.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual maximum number of Phases of RackPDU.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RackPDU.description: This is the schema definition for a Rack Power Distribution Unit - RackPDU.
RackPDU.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Rack Power Distribution Unit (Rack PDU) for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Alarms.description: Contains the navigation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of RackPDU.
AssetTag.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Asset Tag of RackPDU.

Branches.description: This is the definition for Branch Circuits.
Branches.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for Branch Circuits for a Redfish implementation.

CircuitSummary.description: Contains summary information about the circuits of this PDU.
CircuitSummary.longDescription: This property shall indicate the circuit summary information for this RackPDU.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of RackPDU.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual date of manufacture of RackPDU.

EnergyReading.description: The energy sensor for this PDU.
EnergyReading.longDescription: This object shall contain the total energy, measured in Watt-hours (units of Watts), for this PDU, which represents the 'Total' ElectricalSourceType sensor when multiple energy sensors exist for this PDU.

FirmwareVersion.description: The Firmware Version of this Rack PDU.
FirmwareVersion.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Firmware Version of RackPDU.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of RackPDU.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Hardware Revision of PDU.

Humidity.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure humidity.

Location.description: The actual Physical Location of RackPDU.
Location.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Physical Location of RackPDU.

Mains.description: This is the definition for AcInput.
Mains.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AcInput for a Redfish implementation.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Manufacturer of RackPDU.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of PDU.
Model.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Model Number of PDU.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OutletGroups.description: This is the definition for Outlet Groups.
OutletGroups.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for Outlet Groups for a Redfish implementation.

Outlets.description: This is the definition for Outlets.
Outlets.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for Outlets for a Redfish implementation.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of RackPDU.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Part Number of RackPDU.

PowerReading.description: The power sensor for this circuit.
PowerReading.longDescription: This object shall contain the total power, measured in Watts, for this circuit, which represents the 'Total' ElectricalSourceType sensor when multiple power sensors exist for this circuit.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of RackPDU.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Serial Number of RackPDU.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Temperatures.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperatures.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.

UUID.description: The Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) for this RackPDU.
UUID.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the universal unique identifier number for the RackPDU.

title: #RackPDU.v0_8_0.RackPDU
